Description:
Steel chrome beauties sparkle at the starting line. Engines compete in volume. Guitar strings taut nerves. Wag graceful feminine hands - and all participants with furious speed thwarted in rapid flight, leaving only a trail of smoke from the hot tires. Lightning skipping block by block, forget uncertainty and fear. You have the power superhuman strength, hundreds of horses under the hood of brilliant! With their help you prove your right to be called the king of the roads in the new episode of the saga car Need for Speed.
The competition starts in the city, where you have to win honor and respect opponents from different areas. You are very risk, defying Tough Guys on the expensive wheelbarrows, and you can lose everything. However, without risk there is no victory and recognition - even where there are competing the best of the best, the winner is always only one. Hazardous events are sure to attract the attention of the police. And when the situation escalated to the limit, you will have to leave the streets of the city and moved races in Carbon Canyon famous. This is where the real test will begin!Features:Become the king of racing. Henceforth, the main prize - no money and no glory, and comprehensive power. By participating and winning in races, you block by block subjugates all local Street reyserskuyu "crowd." Over time, greenhorns youths will you worship and gladly accept the offer to play for your team!
Tuning as an art. This is the approach Need for Speed Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Ã¢â‚¬â€¹Carbon modernizing cars. The car is not a luxury but a means of expression. Millions of parts from top manufacturers, airbrush and bright stickers will make any rattletrap a masterpiece of design ideas.
One on the road - not a warrior. To honorably endure all the tests you need help. Carefully selected each member of the team, because of the experience and professionalism of your teammates depend on the place in the next race.
What I want - at the Kacha! Even the most sophisticated connoisseurs of cars will find a car to taste. The choice represented by more than fifty of the fastest machines today and the golden age of the automobile industry. Each four-wheeled beauty you can drive to the studio and unrecognizable.
